headline: Is Constellation Brands, Inc. (STZ) Among Billionaire Daniel Sundheim’s Stock Picks Heading Into 2025?
summary: We recently published a list of Billionaire Daniel Sundheim’s Top 15 Stock Picks Heading Into 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Constellation Brands, Inc.
